quest.reward: You must go north to the castle and talk to the fairies at the top of the six towers.  Each will ask you a riddle.  Your reward will be a rune.  Once you the six runes, you must arrange them to form a password.  Once you discover the password, you may chant it to enter the treasure chamber.  You may not leave the fairy until you have solved her riddle.  Good luck!
quest.riddle: I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
